#summary management of dates

= Introduction =

Dates are coming. XForms can leverage the date datatype from XML schema and HTML5 has defined "date" as a new @type value for input (already supported in Opera). The future looks good. For the present …


= Date library =
{{{jQuery.forces.date.*}}}
||Method/Property || Description || Return value ||
|| {{{.format(date, format)}}} || formats a date || (String) format with patterns replaced by date values ||
|| {{{.DD(date)}}} || same as {{{.format(date, 'DD')}}} || (String) two digit day of month ||
|| {{{.MM(date)}}} || same as {{{.format(date, 'MM')}}} || (String) two digit month ||

== Format patterns ==
|| Pattern || Description || Sample values ||
|| {{{YYYY}}} || 4 digit year || 2009, 1999 ||
|| {{{DD}}} || 2 digit date (day of the month) || 01–31 ||
|| {{{MM}}} || 2 digit month || 01–12 ||
